ygData.subject: Re: Dwarven Axe
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: G2 Dan  To: eqbards@onelist.com  Date: Sunday, July 04, 1999 5:29 PM Subject: Re: [eqbards] Dwarven
ygData.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: G2 Dan <drockwell@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, July 04, 1999 5:29 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Dwarven Axe


>From: "G2 Dan" <drockwell@...>
>
>I was talking to a fellow bard on Xegony last nite about the woes of the
>mino and how the Dwarven Axe is better. Any idea where this axe can be
>obtained, or how much it usually runs price wise? What are its stats?
>
>Gediprimie
>Xegony
>


Crushbone.
Seems fairly common now
in 30 minutes I saw 2 auctioned at 8pp (bought 1)
6/26, only weighs 4 (a regular scimitar weighs 7.5)

Very nice. 'course I don't have it anymore, thanks
to the bug that put me in the "cat" room under West
commonlads without my inventory.
